solution_line_template: Each bank teller has {rolls_per_teller} x {coins_per_roll} = <<{rolls_per_teller}*{coins_per_roll}={coins_per_teller}>>{coins_per_teller} coins.
Thus, four bank tellers have {coins_per_teller} x {num_tellers} = <<{coins_per_teller}*{num_tellers}={total_coins}>>{total_coins} coins.
